name: Wolf of Bunny Street
description:
You embark on a journey to save your bunny friends in order to keep the community together while fighting off the wolf of bunny street. 

Test your skills in this casual game! You can save bunnies and scare away the wolf. 

Controls: 

  1. Beat the clock and keep all the bunnies safe
  2. If the wolf grabs a bunny, shoot towards it to save it
  3. Spacebar = Shoot the wolf’s hands to scare him away
  4. A + D or Left/Right arrow keys  = Aim and move the cannon with WASD or arrow keys
  5. Esc = Pause the game
